/home/kamil/zpr/Monopoly/NotificationWall.h File Reference /home/kamil/zpr/Monopoly/NotificationWall.h
Header file of class used to display list of messages/notifications as finite list with certain length. It automatically rolls over when gets next message.

Classes
class NotificationWall
Detailed Description
Header file of class used to display list of messages/notifications as finite list with certain length. It automatically rolls over when gets next message.
